sentences.en: But those less gravy boat is abundance abundance than an heirloom to me.

sentences.en: She treasured brooch because it was an heirloom.

sentences.en: This heirloom has been handed for several generations.

trans.tran_en: a valuable object that has been owned by a family for many years and that is passed from the older members to the younger members
